summary: As requested, Cara Dragonborn as a follower. Both Selene from Underworld and my own make on Mjoll the Dragoness
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE!!

(Because of problems with compatibility between the new CK and several of the mods Ive used I had to remake the NPCs without CK, for now they will still have the warpaint on them and their original names, everything else will look the same though as it should since I was able to use all the mods. This is temporary and as I get better with CK and compatible mods come out Ill take the warpaint off and change the names back)


After getting a few requests to make Cara a follower I decided to try and figure out a way to do it with the CK, Im pretty new to modding and tried making stand alone followers which failed pretty badly, instead, I decided to modify existing followers. I picked Aela for the dark haired version that looks like Selene on Underworld, thought their hunter styles would go well together. For Mjoll I changed her appearance to the Blonde Cara one and changed her name to the Dragoness since The Armor looks more like that. The mods listed below will be needed to make them look like they do in the pictures... Each is seperate in case you dont want to have one replaced. If there are any problems leave me a comment and Ill try to work it out.

AOF Believable Hair -Female and Male (by AnOldFriend)
No More Blocky Faces - No_More_Blocky_Faces-1_50 (by Xenius)
Better Females by Bella - Better Females by Bella Version 3 (by BellaGail)
Better Females by Bella - Less Make up Version 2 (by BellaGail)
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- - Caliente Female Body Mod BBE v3 (by Caliente)
CBBE skin texture V2 and V3 support - CBBE skin texture v1_4 universal (by navetsea)
High Quality Eyes - High_Quality_Eyes-1_20 (by Xenius)
Really Smooth Female Faces - Really Smooth Female Faces V3 (by Zalzama)
No Helmet Mod (By Vuradic)

CBBE Daedric Female - Daedric Female Armor v3 (by Laxi2610)
Daedric female armor replacer - DaedricFemaleArmor (by MaikCG)
Daedric female armor replacer - DaedricFemaleArmor_v2 (by MaikCG)

If you are looking for the savegame you can find it at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7390
author: speedaemonc4
